FuncDef: This command displays box-wide operational information related to the GTP uplink interfaces (Gn, S2a, S2b).
CLIs: uplink session [ peer-address <ip-address> ] [ router <router-instance> ] [ remote-control-teid <teid> ] [ local-control-teid <teid> ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) of this UE.
Specifies the IP address of the Mobile Gateway (PGW or GGSN).
Specifies the identifier of the virtual router instance where the GTP tunnel is terminated.
Specifies the remote control plane Tunnel Endpoint Identifier (TEID).
Specifies the local control plane TEID.
